page.title: 06PARKGATE FARM,TABLEY
page.content: THIS IS A MIXED FARM OF 105 ACRES.IT HAS HEREFORD CROSS-BREED HEIFERS,WHICH ARE CROSSED WITH THE FRESIAN CATTLE AND FATTENED FOR BEEF.THE FARM ALSO HAS TWO DOZEN HENS.THE CROPS THEY HAD WERE BARLEY AND OATS. THE MACHINERY USED INCLUDES,A TRACTOR,A MOWING MACHINE,A BALE-ELEVATOR,A CORN CRUSHER AND A MILKING MACHINE.THE TRACTOR IS THE MOST USEFUL TO THE FARMER. WHEN HE BOUGHT HIS TRACTOR IT COST SEVEN HUNDRED POUNDS,NOW IT WOULD BE WORTH ABOUT TEN THOUSAND POUNDS.THE TRACTOR IS TWENTY-ONE YEARS OLD. MR CARMICHAEL,THE FARMER,HAS A GOOD SENSE OF HUMOUR AND IS SUPERSTITIOUS.HE HAS THREE PETS;A DOG CALLED FLORRIE AND TWO CATS,BLACKY AND SANDY.HIS FAVOURITE TIME IS THE LAST DAY OF THE HARVEST.
